dispense_water.name: Dispense Water
dispense_water.description: Dispense a specified amount of water with the selected carbonation level.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Blanco Unit device to dispense water from.

amount_ml.name: Amount
amount_ml.description: Amount of water to dispense in milliliters (100-1500ml, in increments of 100ml).

co2_intensity.name: Carbonation Level
co2_intensity.description: CO2 carbonation intensity: 1 = Still water, 2 = Medium carbonation, 3 = High carbonation.

change_pin.name: Change PIN
change_pin.description: Change the device PIN code. Optionally update the integration configuration to reconnect automatically with the new PIN.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Blanco Unit device to change the PIN for.

update_config.name: Update Configuration
update_config.description: When enabled, the integration configuration will be updated with the new PIN and the device will reconnect automatically. When disabled, you will need to manually reconfigure the integration with the new PIN.
